title: new chap ideas
body:
i know a new champ just came out but me might as well think of a new one or some ideas to help riot get a new chap cracken 

{{champion:420}} {{champion:420}} is pretty new still but who cars the more champs the better 

LEAVE you comments please 
VOTE ON POLE

replies.body:
Well they already have Ao Shin to release, been 2 years now since the teaser? Also Gypsylord (Gnar, Ekko, Jinx and Vi designer) said he wanted to release a champion with pet robot.

I want those first I think, before any new stuff.
